xme_add_component (
    "sensorMonitor_adv_monitorKB"
    HEADERS
        "include/monitorKBComponentWrapper.h"
        "include/monitorKBComponent.h"
        "include/printSensorValueFunctionWrapper.h"
        "include/printSensorValueFunction.h"

        "src/monitorKBComponentWrapper.c"
        "src/monitorKBComponent.c"
        "src/printSensorValueFunctionWrapper.c"
        "src/printSensorValueFunction.c"
        "src/monitorKBManifest.c"
    DEPENDS
        xme_core_directory_attribute
    # PROTECTED REGION ID(SENSORMONITOR_ADV_MONITORKB_CMAKELISTS_TXT_XMEADDCOMPONENT) ENABLED START

    # PROTECTED REGION END
)
